# async_structured_context_call

The AsyncStructuredContextCall module for generating structured responses using LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/async_structured_context_call/index" symbolName="Context" /> Context

Context for LLM calls.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/async_structured_context_call/index" symbolName="AsyncStructuredStream" /> AsyncStructuredStream

An asynchronous stream of partial structured outputs from an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/async_structured_context_call/index" symbolName="ContextResponse" /> ContextResponse

The response generated by an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/async_structured_context_call/index" symbolName="Dataclass" /> Dataclass

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/async_structured_context_call/index" symbolName="BaseStructuredContextCall" /> BaseStructuredContextCall

A base class for generating responses using LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Class" path="calls/async_structured_context_call/index" symbolName="AsyncStructuredContextCall" /> AsyncStructuredContextCall

A class for generating structured responses using LLMs asynchronously.
